com.googlecode.jmxtrans
Class JmxTransformer

java.lang.Object
  com.googlecode.jmxtrans.JmxTransformer
All Implemented Interfaces:
WatchedCallback
public class JmxTransformer
extends java.lang.Object
implements WatchedCallback

Main() class that takes an argument which is the directory to look in for files which contain json data that defines queries to run against JMX servers.

Author:
jon
